text: waldhyn aminuu biallah wrswlh, wtrku diarihim qasdyn dar al'islam 'aw bldana yatamakanun fih min eibadat rbhm, wajahiduu l'iela' kalimat allh, waladhin nsru 'iikhwanahum almuhajirin wawwhm wwaswhm balmal waltayyd, 'uwlayik hum almuminun alsaadiqun hqana, lahum maghfirat ldhnwbhm, warizq karim wasie fi janaat alneym
